TextView.android:text: Manohar Maganthi (RVR PRO): RVR PRO is a professional Photography, Videography and Post Production services provider for small scale to large scale media projects. A area of photography which is very difficult to master. They have the most updated equipment all over India. This is their first workshop in the whole of India.
